question: Which one of the following correctly represents the top four largest solar power producing states?
option1: Gujarat, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh & Tamil Nadu
option3: Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan, Tamil Nadu
option4: Gujarat, Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh & Andhra Pradesh
explanation: Gujarat is currently the top solar power generating state with commissioned capacity of 929 MW out of the country’s total capacity of 3,002.66 MW. Gujarat is followed by Rajasthan (839.5MW), Madhya Pradesh (353.58MW), Maharashtra (286.9MW) and Andhra Pradesh (234.86MW). Data source TOI (15.2.2015)
